definition: edge and corner/protrusion/sharpness (of a protrusion)/craggy/ridge corner
corner/edge/arris (sharp ridge formed by two surfaces meeting at an edge)/protrusion
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The main sound box uses the edges and corners distinct rectangle design, the line succinct sprightly .
sentences.chinese: 主音箱采用棱角分明的长方形设计，线条简洁明快。

sentences.english: In this paper, the fatigue problem of beam joints of steel bridges is studied through examining the arris weld.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了钢桥钢梁中棱角焊缝构造细节的疲劳问题。

sentences.english: Is it sharp or quite smooth at the edges?
sentences.chinese: 它的棱角是凌厉还是光滑？

sentences.english: It’s jet black, all sharp angles and industrial-looking edges.
sentences.chinese: 它全身墨黑，棱角分明，带浓浓的工业气息。

sentences.english: And to her it seemed that the angle of his jaw had changed; its pitch had become unpleasantly aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 在她眼里他那下腭已棱角毕露，开合时咄咄逼人。

sentences.english: Moonlight shows us none of life’s harder edges. Hillsides seem silken and silvery, the oceans still and blue in its light.
sentences.chinese: 月光收起了生活中的坚硬棱角。

sentences.english: Abundent onto the edge angle grinding their edges and corners.
sentences.chinese: 敲掉身上的棱棱角角打磨自己。

sentences.english: If a jeweler's hammer isn't strong enough to chip off our rough edges, God will use a sledgehammer.
sentences.chinese: 若首饰匠的细锤无法除去我们的棱角，神便动用大锤。

sentences.english: Our rough edges must be chipped away to bring out the image of Christ.
sentences.chinese: 生命的棱角须经雕凿，才能显出上帝形象。

sentences.english: Would like time can polish your edges and corners.
sentences.chinese: 愿时光可以磨平你的棱角。

sentences.english: No angular design of the inner edge to facilitate the usual clean, efficient water-saving.
sentences.chinese: 无棱角的内缘设计，便于平时的清洁，高效节水。

sentences.english: Clean chamfered end of pipe and socket.
sentences.chinese: 清洁管子末端棱角和插口。

sentences.english: A blanket of snow softens a city's hard edges. It quiets loud noises.
sentences.chinese: 一层白雪会软化城市的棱角，让嘈杂的世界安静下来。

sentences.english: It has to be crushed after firing and the aggregate therefore has sharp corners .
sentences.chinese: 煅烧后需要进行破碎，因此骨料具有尖锐的棱角。

sentences.english: The ground was strewn with sharp-edged pebbles.
sentences.chinese: 地上铺满了棱角锋利的石子。

sentences.english: Like the foot, it has only curves and no angles.
sentences.chinese: 就像人脚，新干线车身只有曲线，没有棱角。

definition: (of a shape) sharp and clearcut/(of a person) definite in his opinion
mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
Fangzheng county in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang
to fold the corner of a page/to dog-ear
